Genie’s Intercession.name: Genie’s Intercession
Genie’s Intercession.fullText:
Prince of Genies Attack 11Genie’s Intercession

An elemental spirit rushes forth to punish your attacker and then propels you and a comrade to safer spots.

Encounter        Elemental, Teleportation
Immediate Reaction      Melee 1

Trigger: You are hit by an enemy adjacent to you.

Target: The triggering enemy

Attack: Highest ability modifier + 4 vs. Reflex
    Level 21: Highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d6 + your highest ability modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You and one ally adjacent to you each teleport up to 5 squares.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 135.
Genie’s Intercession.flavor: An elemental spirit rushes forth to punish your attacker and then propels you and a comrade to safer spots.
Genie’s Intercession.trigger: You are hit by an enemy adjacent to you.
Genie’s Intercession.attack:
Highest ability modifier + 4 vs. Reflex
    Level 21: Highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Reflex
Genie’s Intercession.onHit: 2d6 + your highest ability modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
Genie’s Intercession.effect: You and one ally adjacent to you each teleport up to 5 squares.

Genie’s Gift.name: Genie’s Gift
Genie’s Gift.fullText:
Prince of Genies Attack 20Genie’s Gift

The genie’s vessel pops open, releasing a powerful elemental spirit that catches your enemies by surprise.

Daily        Charm, Elemental
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Highest ability modifier + 5 vs. Will

Hit: The target is dazed (save ends).

Miss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Effect: You or one ally in the burst gains an action point that must be used before the end of your next turn or it is lost.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 136.
Genie’s Gift.flavor: The genie’s vessel pops open, releasing a powerful elemental spirit that catches your enemies by surprise.
Genie’s Gift.onMiss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Genie’s Gift.effect: You or one ally in the burst gains an action point that must be used before the end of your next turn or it is lost.

Limited Wish.name: Limited Wish
Limited Wish.fullText:
Prince of Genies Utility 12Limited Wish

Name your desire, and the genie provides it.

Daily        Elemental
Minor Action      Close burst 1

Target: You or one ally in the burst

Effect: Choose one of the following.
         The target regains the use of an expended encounter utility power.
         The target treats its next miss before the end of the encounter as a hit.
         The target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter.
         The target gains training in one skill of his or her choice until the end of the encounter.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 136.
Limited Wish.flavor: Name your desire, and the genie provides it.
Limited Wish.target: You or one ally in the burst
Limited Wish.effect:

         The target gains training in one skill of his or her choice until the end of the encounter.
